mapper.select: SELECT t.*, ta.attraction_no FROM trips t LEFT JOIN trip_attractions ta ON t.no = ta.trip_no WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.no, ta.sequence;

SELECT t.no AS trip_no, t.user_id, t.title AS trip_title, t.description, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.created, t.updated, a.no AS attraction_no, a.title AS attraction_title, a.content_type_id, a.area_code, a.si_gun_gu_code, a.scene_title, a.address, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.overview, a.img, a.tel, a.like_count FROM trips t LEFT JOIN trip_attractions ta ON t.no = ta.trip_no LEFT JOIN attractions a ON ta.attraction_no = a.no WHERE t.no = #{tripNo} ORDER BY ta.sequence;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trips ( user_id, title, description, start_date, end_date, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE trips SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT attraction_no FROM trip_attractions WHERE trip_no = #{tripNo} ORDER BY sequence
